title: Planning Reforms: Local Communities On the Back Foot (with Bob Blackman MP)
itunes:title: Planning Reforms: Local Communities On the Back Foot (with Bob Blackman MP)
description:
Bob Blackman, Conservative MP for Harrow East tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker that the government's new planning rules which favour developers, puts local communities on the back foot.

And U.K. voters don't get why pubs need to close in order to reopen schools. This and other coronavirus troubles for Boris Johnson's government with James Johnson, founder of JL Partners and former advisor to Prime Minister Theresa May.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
